#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Decencies =

  * curl 
  * openscenegraph 
  * boost-iostreams
  * tinyxml


On Debian-based distros this should install all depecies (except tinyxml): 

`sudo apt-get install libcurl4-openssl-dev libopenscenegraph-dev libboost-iostreams-dev`

Tinyxml in not currently on Ubuntu's repos. 

libtinyxml-dev_2.5.3-3_i386.deb.


= Compiling =

There is a makefile in the idapresentation directory:

`cd idapresentation`
`make`

= Running demo =

A simple demo is located in examples directory:

`./viewer --file examples/demo.smil`
